Auto Call Recorder is supported by a dedicated mic that cancels unimportant noise from the new XL20 and records the voice in pure sound. Once fully charged, the phone will drain its battery in seven days if used normally and will provide standby up-to 3 weeks. XL20 by QMobile comes with schedule SMS, a feature that allows user to type SMS and schedule for coming days or hours making it convenient for wishing or reminding important tasks. QMobile XL20 is available all over Pakistan in low price with 12 months warranty.
